newsitem.title: UK: NWE oil products steady to stronger.
newsitem.headline: NWE oil products steady to stronger.

text.p: NWE oil products were firm to stronger on Thursday.
Gasoline was steady and barge trade was heard done at $204 fob ARA.
Naphtha was firmer with crude. Full-range material remains at a discount to light and heavy naphtha.
Gas oil was generally stronger on higher futures, firm cargo premiums and a slightly tighter market.
Fuel oil cargoes shot up on tight avails up. $104.50 cif NWE was done against a deal on Wednesday at $96 cif NWE.
